peril.ai

Class FinalBoss

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.ai.AI
      • peril.ai.FinalBoss

  • public final class FinalBoss
extends AI
    An AI built with the sole intention of out performing all other AI.
    Since:
    2018-03-16
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    AI, AIController

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double DEFENSE_FACTOR
      Denotes how much larger a enemy army must be in order for the FinalBoss to block the link between those two armies.
      private static java.lang.String NAME
      The name of this AI.
      private static double PLAYER_FACTOR
      The weighting that the standing of a player has over a decision.
      private static double TRADE_FACTOR
      The weighting that defines how long the FinalBoss will wait before it trades a unit for the stronger one.
      private static double UNIT_FACTOR
      The weighting that the size of an army has over a decision.

      This FinalBoss will attack countries.
      AIOperation processFortify(AIController api)
      This FinalBoss will move all its units to the country that it can use to attack the most neighbouring countries.
      AIOperation processReinforce(AIController api)
      This FinalBoss will reinforce all its countries.

      • playerRating

        private static int playerRating(Player player,
                                AIController api)
        Retrieves a rating for the specified Player that ranges from 0 to 100 where 100 is the strongest possible Player.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to rate.
        api - The AIController that allows the FinalBoss to query the state of the game.
        Returns:
        The rating of the Player.

      • getBestUnitToTrade

        private static Unit getBestUnitToTrade(AIController api,
                                       Country country)
        Retrieves the best Unit from a Country's Army.
        Parameters:
        api - The AIController that allows the FinalBoss to query the state of the game.
        country - The Country that will be evaluated.
        Returns:
        The best Unit for this Country to trade up. This can be null if there are no possible units to trade.
